description:
Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Player Killer: “I’ll finish you in three turns.”  Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cut Through the Darkness! Swords of Revealing Light
Yami o Kirisake! Hikari no Gofuuken
闇を切り裂け! 光の護封剣
